short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the New Tab Page to a selected color

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Makes the new tab page completely blank and allows you to set the background to whatever you want, assuming you have a little knowledge of CSS. Defaults to #393939, but can be customised by opening the extension's options menu.

This has little to no utility for 99% of people, who want functionality in their NTP.
